column2: "Hey, <%me>. You've been taking a lot of quests. Do you have any specific goals in mind?"
"Nah, you don't need to tell me if you don't want to. Everyone has their reasons."
"Being an ARKS member has a lot of prestige, so there's people that do it for that as well. I guess that's not too bad a reason."
"Hmm? Why did I join the ARKS?"
"It's actually pretty simple... it was the only option available."
"The reason doesn't really matter, as long as you are careful. You only have one life."
